message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.mobi.rdf.api.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.api.*' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.AbstractOrmFactory' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.OrmFactory' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.Thing' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverter' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
